mapper.select: SELECT b.seq AS 'seq', b.nm AS 'building_nm', s.seq AS 'section_seq', s.nick_nm AS 'section_nick_nm', s.floor AS 'section_floor', s.sex AS 'section_sex', ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM secret_room sr WHERE sr.section_seq = s.seq ) AS 'section_room_count', ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM secret_room sr WHERE sr.section_seq = s.seq AND stat = 'USE' ) AS 'section_use_room_count', ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM section_knock k WHERE k.section_seq = s.seq AND k.reg_ymdt > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -15 MINUTE) ) AS 'section_current_knock_count' FROM building b LEFT OUTER JOIN section s ON b.seq = s.building_seq WHERE b.seq = #{buildingSequence}
